communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Mission reports (MISREPs) including grid coordinates, amount and type of ordnance employed, date, unit, and comments from pilot, JTAC eyewitness reporting, or plane data for all aircraft operating for the CENTCOM CAOC as part of OEF from October 2001 through December 2015.

See attached report from Institute for Defense Analyses for further description of records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aidan Milliff

title: Afghanistan Nationwide Quarterly Assessment Research (United States Agency for International Development)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Microdata, questionnaires, and district-wave summary statistics from the Afghanistan National Quarterly Assessment Research (ANQAR) survey waves 1-31, referenced in the attached report of the Lead Inspector General for Overseas Contingency Operations "Operation Freedom's Sentinel: Report to the United States Congress."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aidan Milliff
